trans-unit.source: Allows declarative <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueue"></xref> permission checks.
trans-unit.target: 선언적 허용 <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueue"> </xref> 권한 검사 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 특성을 사용 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [특성](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAttribute"></xref> class.
One of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref> values.
Gets or sets the queue category.
The queue category (Message Queuing type identifier), which allows an application to categorize its queues.
trans-unit.target: 큐 범주 (메시지 큐 형식 식별자)를 응용 프로그램의 큐를 분류할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

Creates the permission based on the requested access levels, category, label, computer name, and path that are set through the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAttribute.PermissionAccess*>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAttribute.Category*>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAttribute.Label*>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAttribute.MachineName*>, and <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAttribute.Path*> properties on the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 요청 된 액세스 수준, 범주, 레이블, 컴퓨터 이름 및 경로 통해 설정에 따라 권한을 만듭니다는 <> </> *>, <> </> *>, <> </> *>, <> </> *>, 및 <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAttribute.Path*>특성의 속성입니다.</xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAttribute.Path*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.IPermission"></xref> that represents the created permission.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.IPermission"> </xref> 만들어진된 사용 권한을 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the queue description.
The label for the message queue.
The value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the name of the computer where the Message Queuing queue is located.
trans-unit.target: 메시지 큐 큐가 있는 컴퓨터의 이름을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the computer where the queue is located.
The value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the queue's path.
The queue that is referenced by the <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueue"></xref>.
The value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the permission access levels used in the permissions request.
trans-unit.target: 권한 요청에 사용 되는 권한 액세스 수준을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAccess"></xref> values.
